verbs.description: [ARG0: army] [V: showed] [ARG1: the way] but power five schools still wo n't embrace the triple option the triple option has been successful throughout the history of college football but power five schools hesitate to embrace its obvious benefits power five schools colorado air force kansas lsu mike leach kevin sumlin navy jeff monken paul johnson american football coach iowa state jamie pollard power five school army oklahoma niumatalolo georgia tech sooners texas ken niumatalolo arizona khalil tate mike leach vanderbilt matt campbell director network analyst new mexico tulane football rich rodriguez barry switzer wildcats knights paul johnson ivin jasper gerry dinardo
